segments.text: Please pull your table down . It's lunch hour .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You may choose from the fish and beef .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here you are . Would you like a cup of tea or coffee ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I'd rather have a glass of juice , please . What kinds do you have ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have a selection of orange , apple , grape and lemonade .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll have a glass of lemonade . More ice , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . Will there be anything else ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you give me more paper napkins ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're welcome . Enjoy your meal . Press the call button if you need any more help .
segments.speaker: S1
